post.author: Kelly Lee
post.content:
PROGRAMMER ANALYST

THE JOB

The Programmer Analyst is responsible for back-end application development. Reporting to Manager, Technical Development, the successful candidate will work primarily within the Technical Development group and will be engaged in high priority software development initiatives.

Candidate responsibilities will include the following:
- Architecture, programming and support on consumer focused Java/J2EE projects.
- Full technical ownership of several key member retention tools.
- Working closely with client development and network group to ensure 24/7 support of applications.
- Provide basic administration, backup, recovery, installation and maintenance of existing production applications.
- Responsible to work with content development, project management and design teams.
- Responsible to work closely with both the US and International development teams.
- Assist in QA and creation of test plans.
- Development using a wide range of internet technologies along with AOL proprietary tools.


SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE REQUIRED

-Proven technical background with considerable software engineering and development skills
-3+ years of application object-oriented design/development experience using Java- and J2EE/EJB-associated technologies (JSP, JDBC, JMS, JTS)
-7+ years of application object-oriented design/development experience with C/C++
-3+ years of experience with design/development of multi-tier net-centric architectures
-2+ years of experience with of servlet engines and application servers (e.g. iPlanet, WebLogic, WebSphere)
-Experience using XML/XSL/XSLT related standards
-Experience with Testing Methodologies
-3+ years of Microsoft Visual C++ development experience
-5+ years of client-server development experience including client, server, middleware, communications
-3+ years of Internet/Web development experience including scripting languages such as Perl
-Strong (5+ years) Windows and UNIX skills
-Strong (5+ years) SQL/RDBMS design experience (Sybase preferrable, Oracle optional)
-Strong written and verbal communications skills. Strong organizational skills

Special Requirements:

-Bachelor뭩 degree in a technical field (engineering, computer science)


REWARDS

AOL Canada has a lively team environment and deploys state of the art technology . We offer a competitive compensation package and excellent benefits, along with an outstanding career opportunity. Apply your skills with a worldwide leader and experience the rewards we have to offer.

Please send your resume with salary history in confidence to Human Resources Department, Recruiter, AOL Canada; e-mail llhawke@aol.com


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
Ref Code: lh 42  

Contact Information
LLHAWKE@AOL.COM
55 St Clair Ave West
Toronto
post.title: PROGRAMMER ANALYST
